item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 艾伦·凯：预测未来（Predicting The Future） in the user temberature at 2022-05-19T05:35:39
item.description:
in reference to:

在一些数学和科学课程中，他们经常告诉你，最好的方法是改变问题。我认为最好的方法是改变问题陈述的背景。几年前，马文·明斯基说，“你只有通过多种方式才能理解一件事。”（You don’t understand something until you understand it more than one way.）

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我们如何才能开发出变革性的思想工具？ in the user temberature at 2022-05-24T05:50:43
item.description:
in reference to:

Adobe 与许多其他软件公司的共同点是，他们的大部分专利都是防御性的：他们把一些想法申请专利，以便专利恶霸无法通过类似的相互起诉他们。这样与理想情况大相径庭。创新型公司很容易受到专利恶霸的攻击，这些恶霸有庞大的专利库，其中专利的权利要求广泛而模糊，也没有多少细节，不费吹灰之力。但是，一旦创新型公司投入更多来实现一个非常不错的新创意，其他公司总能复制该创新的核心，对其进行合适改变，以合理地规避任何专利侵权。专利制度没有保护应该保护的东西。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我们如何才能开发出变革性的思想工具？ in the user temberature at 2022-05-24T05:56:52
item.description:
in reference to:

虽然硬件可以被复制，但它往往比复制软件要昂贵得多。而且不仅如此，这类公司的优势往往在于分销、营销，以及与为该平台生产产品的供应商的关系。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我们如何才能开发出变革性的思想工具？ in the user temberature at 2022-05-24T05:58:47
item.description:
in reference to:

慈善资金支持。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 4.6. 暂退法（Dropout） — 动手学深度学习 2.0.0-beta0 documentation in the user temberature at 2022-05-26T05:59:23
item.description:
in reference to:

需要说明的是，暂退法的原始论文提到了一个关于有性繁殖的类比： 神经网络过拟合与每一层都依赖于前一层激活值相关，称这种情况为“共适应性”。 作者认为，暂退法会破坏共适应性，就像有性生殖会破坏共适应的基因一样。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 加粗几个字母之后，英语阅读速度原地起飞，真的这么神奇吗？ in the user temberature at 2022-06-02T07:14:02
item.description:
in reference to:

这也解释了仿生阅读为什么妨碍了习惯扫读的读者。对于这些人来说，可能整体高亮关键词、或者高亮句首、段首会更有用。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 加粗几个字母之后，英语阅读速度原地起飞，真的这么神奇吗？ in the user temberature at 2022-06-02T07:15:27
item.description:
in reference to:

从这个角度来讲，仿生阅读也未必适用于所有文章。沈阳师范大学曾做过一项文本标注对中文阅读眼动的研究。研究显示，虽然添加高亮会指引和帮助参与者们更好地记忆重点内容、忽略干扰内容，但如果含有错误标识或标识过多，那与无标识的阅读效率几乎是一样的。同时，如果阅读的文本是比较简单的内容，那标示也未必可以提高正确率。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T05:02:44
item.description:
in reference to:

你的 PDF 和电子书阅读器中的标注，可以自然地这个中心化的 SRS 中找到，而不是封存在某个无法访问的侧边栏中。现代操作系统，会根据聊天消息或电子邮件，尝试创建日历事件或建立联系人。类似地，SRS 系统也可能根据你标为书签的链接，或重复搜索的短语，来尝试创建 SRS 卡片。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T05:05:35
item.description:
in reference to:

记忆：重复回忆问题；时间间隔随着回答成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 过程的流畅性：重复完成简短练习，有许多变体；时间间隔随着成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 卡片写作：重复问题、模糊的想法、主干想法，从中积累思考，时间跨度为几个月；将卡片标记为「有成果」或「无成果」，以扩大/缩小时间间隔 习惯养成：重复简短的反思卡片，可能根据顺序改变，应用于你的日常经验；间隔默认扩大，但可以放缓 阅读队列：一系列 PDF，标签页，书本，总在变换：如果一段时间内忽略某些内容，它就会暂离一周，之后是一个月；比如说「我现在读够什么了」，这东西就会几天之内再次呈现；说某个东西「不是现在读」，那就几个月，之后是几个月之后再呈现…… 电子邮件收件箱、任务队列、个人通信等

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 中医这件事 in the user temberature at 2022-06-25T14:17:45
item.description:
in reference to:

所以后来索性把医生的眼睛也蒙起来——不告诉医疗人员哪组是安慰剂组哪组是实验组，所有的结果由第三方机构去统计和评判，这就是双盲对照实验。这种测试最大限度地排除了病人的安慰剂效应和医生的主观偏好，成为了判断药物客观疗效最有力的证据，现代医学的“金标准”。

item.description:

item.description:
in reference to:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Automating Read It Later Articles to DEVONthink - GeekDad in the user temberature at 2022-08-27T04:50:54
item.description:
in reference to:

So when you see something you want to dive into later when you have a bit more time… you have to put it somewhere. That is where a “read-it-later” service like Pocket or Instapaper comes in. Basic features with these services are free, but if you want more advanced features like “search” you have to pay. In the case of Pocket, it will cost you $4.99 a month or $44.99 a year to keep a permanent library of saved articles and be able to search the content of those articles.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:
in reference to:

Then many months later I will need to do something related to “that article I read a while back” and I have no way to find it. That is where DEVONthink comes in.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 金融消费者如何购买 in the user temberature at 2022-08-30T15:08:35
item.description:
in reference to:

、合同条款复杂、坑多，金融机构抱怨消费者预期高、拒绝承担风险、不理智。究其原因在于，消费者自身和金融机构对于消费者的金融行为都没有认知和把握。 本书全面梳理了消费者金融行为这个重要但“冷门”的主题，话题涉及常见的金融行为，包括投资、保险、借款、储蓄、资金管理、缴税和规避欺诈，综合了各个主题最前沿的研究，并且以案例结合观点展开阐述。 本书讨论了人们金融行为的决定因素和条件，如个体差异和个性、对风险得失的理解、自信、信任、风险偏好、时间偏好、决策制定和自我调控等等，分析了针对不同的金融消费行为，这些因素是如何地影响着

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated r/devonthink - Is DEVONthink worth it? in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T04:02:11
item.description:
in reference to:

I suppose it depends what you want to use it for. I use it for research mainly. It is excellent for document storage and analysts and it has been a game changer for me. Coupled with its ability with RSS feeds and Devon agent, I have to say it is superb. I suspect I’m only scratching the surface of its capability. It is a pretty steep learning curve but it’s capabilities are massive.Have a look at the videos on www.screencastsonline.com there is a free membership for 7 days which should give you some idea of what it is capable of. They were a great intro for me.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How long does it take to master a language like a native speaker? in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T03:10:21
item.description:
in reference to:

I find that memorizing a number of ‘filler’ words or sentences can greatly increase your ability to come off as native, as well as knowing some expressions and sayings. Instead of expressing agreement with a simple ‘yes’ you could try responding with “you know what? I Agree!” or “I think I see what you mean”. It’s agreement either way but it sounds a lot more ‘native’.

item.description:
in reference to:

To use this feature, simply drag your existing PDFs into your Zotero library or use the “Store Copy of File” or “Link to File” options from the add new item menu (green plus sign). (You can disable these automatic functions in the General pane of Zotero preferences.)

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated FAQ — Emscripten 3.1.21-git (dev) documentation in the user temberature at 2022-09-09T13:09:56
item.description:
in reference to:

Decorating your code with EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE can be useful if you don’t want to have to keep track of functions to export explicitly, and when these exports do not change.

This script will always have access to node APIs no matter whether node integration is turned on or off. The value should be the absolute file path to the script. When node integration is turned off, the preload script can reintroduce Node global symbols back to the global scope.
